Population: Children and adults with fixed orthodontic brackets
Intervention: Self etching primers (one‐step etchant and primer system)
Comparison: Conventional etchants (two‐step etch and prime method using 37% phosphoric acid)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: Two studies at low risk of bias, one at unclear risk, but two with serious risk of selection bias. Low total number of events and the 95% CI includes both no effect and appreciable benefit and harm.
